document.heading: Health Services Planning Program Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-116, the “Health Services Planning Program Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-362 which was referred to the Committee on Health. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 11, 2007, and January 8, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 23, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-259 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-116 became effective on March 20, 2008.
